source_document.title: Ashburn Pricing and Competition Final Analysis
source_document.document_type: Comprehensive market analysis and financial model

extraction_methodology.completeness: Comprehensive extraction of all material information

market_research.industry_reports: Data center market analysis and growth projections
market_research.pricing_benchmarks: Third-party pricing studies and market comparisons
market_research.construction_costs: Regional construction cost indices and contractor quotes

financial_analysis.comparable_transactions: Recent data center acquisitions and developments
financial_analysis.industry_benchmarks: Operating metrics from public REITs and operators
financial_analysis.utility_data: Power costs and availability from utility providers
financial_analysis.financing_terms: Current debt and equity market conditions

technical_specifications.technology_benchmarks: Industry best practices for efficiency and design

source_validation.primary_source_verification: Direct document extraction with page references
source_validation.cross_referencing: Multiple sources used to validate key assumptions
source_validation.currency_check: Data freshness verified for market-sensitive information
source_validation.completeness_review: All material sections and data points captured

extraction_standards.structured_format: Consistent JSON schema across all extracted files
extraction_standards.data_typing: Appropriate numeric, text, and categorical data types
extraction_standards.source_attribution: Clear references to original document sections

validation_process.market_reasonableness: Comparison to industry benchmarks and ranges

document_processing.initial_review: Complete document read-through for structure understanding
document_processing.section_mapping: Identification of key sections and their relationships

json_creation.template_following: Consistent with established GEMINI JSON patterns

high_confidence.criteria: Multiple source validation, recent data, clear documentation

estimated_data.criteria: Derived from comparable transactions or industry benchmarks

temporal_constraints.market_volatility: Technology and competitive landscape subject to rapid change

scope_limitations.facility_type: Enterprise data center focus, limited edge computing detail

analytical_constraints.scenario_modeling: Based on historical patterns, may not capture unprecedented events
analytical_constraints.competitive_intelligence: Public information only, limited proprietary insights
analytical_constraints.regulatory_assumptions: Current regulatory environment, subject to change

created_files.description: Market analysis and comparison with existing DDGA markets
Comprehensive competitor analysis and market positioning
Site selection criteria and market similarity analysis
Complete financial model with projections and assumptions
Sensitivity analysis and risk assessment framework
Comprehensive pricing strategy and market positioning
Key assumptions, omissions, and risk factors

json_file_manifest.extraction_completeness: Comprehensive - all major document sections covered
json_file_manifest.format_consistency: Follows established GEMINI JSON structure and naming conventions

data_interpretation.context_dependency: Data should be interpreted within Ashburn market context
data_interpretation.temporal_relevance: Projections become less reliable beyond 3-5 year horizon
data_interpretation.sensitivity_awareness: Key variables identified should be monitored for changes

update_requirements.market_conditions: Quarterly review recommended for pricing and absorption
update_requirements.competitive_landscape: Monthly monitoring of new market entrants
update_requirements.financial_assumptions: Annual review of construction costs and financing terms

limitations: Not suitable for other geographic markets
